sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'air est très sec en hiver.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The air is very dry in winter.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il prépare un doctorat.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is studying for a doctorate.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les enfants aiment manger des biscuits.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Children like to eat cookies.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他无法承受这么大的压力。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā wúfǎ chéngshòu zhème dà de yālì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il ne peut pas supporter une telle pression.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He cannot bear such great pressure.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les plantes absorbent la lumière du soleil.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Plants absorb sunlight.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ yǒu shénme hǎo fāngfǎ ma?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: As-tu une bonne méthode ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Do you have a good method?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime manger des fruits de mer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like to eat seafood.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a d'innombrables étoiles dans le ciel.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are countless stars in the sky.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il part en voyage d'affaires la semaine prochaine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He will go on a business trip next week.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez suivre les instructions.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please follow the instructions.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle est très bien habillée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is dressed up very beautifully.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèlǐ de shēnghuó tiáojiàn hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les conditions de vie ici sont très bonnes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The living conditions here are very good.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Excusez-moi de vous déranger.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Sorry to disturb you.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 由于天气原因，航班取消了。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yóuyú tiānqì yuányīn, hángbān qǔxiāo le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En raison du temps, le vol a été annulé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Due to the weather, the flight was cancelled.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai perdu mon portefeuille.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I lost my wallet.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Huāyuán lǐ yǒu hěn duō duǒ huā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de fleurs dans le jardin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many flowers in the garden.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 你来这里的目的是什么？
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ lái zhèlǐ de mùdì shì shénme?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quel est le but de ta venue ici ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What is the purpose of your visit here?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le professeur a donné des devoirs.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The teacher assigned homework.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: N'abandonne pas facilement tes rêves.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't easily give up on your dreams.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez me dire le résultat directement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please tell me the result directly.
